CraftingSettings.name: craft.basecraftspeed
CraftingSettings.description: Affects the default crafting speed. Higher is faster, default is 1.

CraftingSettings.name: craft.cleardefaultblueprint
CraftingSettings.description: Clears the list of default blueprints, resetting to Rock & Torch.

CraftingSettings.name: craft.freecrafting
CraftingSettings.description: Makes all crafting cost no resources.

CraftingSettings.name: construct.freeupgrading
CraftingSettings.description: Toggles the ability to upgrade building blocks without consuming resources.

CraftingSettings.name: craft.adddefaultblueprint
CraftingSettings.description: Adds the 'item blueprint' to the player’s inventory upon spawning.

CraftingSettings.name: craft.removedefaultblueprint
CraftingSettings.description: Removes the 'item blueprint' from the list of default items on spawn.

CraftingSettings.name: construct.getbuildinginfo
CraftingSettings.description: Prints the building information for the structure you’re looking at to the console log.

CraftingSettings.name: construct.getvendingmachineinfo
CraftingSettings.description: Prints the building information for the vending machine you’re looking at to the console log.

CraftingSettings.name: construct.nukebuilding
CraftingSettings.description: Obliterates the target building. Takes a Building ID, found by running the getbuildinginfo command.
